articles.title: Italy may have hit Europe's hottest day on record as anticyclone 'Lucifer' sweeps in - CNN

articles.title: Pfizer, Moderna COVID vaccines face new safety probe in Europe over possible link to skin condition, 2 kidney disorders - FiercePharma
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency is trying to determine if mRNA vaccines can trigger an allergic skin reaction called erythema multiforme or two kidney disorders. It has requested additional data from Pfizer, BioNTech and Moderna.
